how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: In 3 simple steps, your school has a profitable, autonomous STEM after-school activity.
how.step1_desc: You order the Brick & Brain Complete Pack: LEGO kit (1012 students) + hybrid training for one teacher. Investment: 5,500 excl. tax.
how.step2_desc: Hybrid training over 12 months: online modules + 2 in-person days at your school. No technical expertise required. Evaluation report included.
how.step3_desc: Your teacher runs workshops independently. You charge families for the activity. Recurring income, zero external dependency.
